content: Fun game but they need a color blind version as it is not color blind friendly at all.
Had to download another program just to play. Wants to sync my Google Play. Not doing it. Also only includes one map game. Must purchase others. Please refund my money.
Loving the game, however, how do I change the colour of my player?
replyContent:
Thanks so much for the love and support!
To change your avatar colour, you simply need to go to "settings" which is represented by a cogwheel in the main menu, and then on the bottom right you can choose which colour you prefer :)

content: Great game, spoilt by too many crashes. Now giving it another try, but servers still not fixed. About half of all games are decided by server issues. Plus my previous purchases (additional maps) have been lost, and no response from asmodee to fix it. The game is really good, but best played on an actual board as this version is almost unplayable and unsupported. (later note: missing maps issue now corrected, there was a delay due to customer service being closed for holiday season. One third of games still impacted by Asmodee server issues, though not as bad as during holiday season. Still struggling on trying to play, so cannot be that bad! Frustrating when the server throws you out and a bot does bad moves for you before you can log back in)
replyContent:
Thanks for your feedback. I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with the game.
However regarding the maps I checked and they're all back onto your account :)
Have you tried reinstalling the app, as this often helps?

content: I bought a the Dutch map of the real game, any chance you will update new maps? Good game, can you add a personal longest route counter or a shared longest route counter? Saves time to count the longest route.
replyContent: Hello Piet and thank you for your review! We took note of it and even if we don't address every suggestion individually for practical reasons, we take them into account for future developments based on community feedback. Best regards, Asmodee Digital Support

content: Came across this game on twitch somehow and then decided to check it out. Glad for the investment. Very re-playable. I had an idea for an update. So once you have built the track, there could be an animated train that runs back and forth, and depending on how many people buy tickets, you get money. It also costs money to run each time. So you only want to run the train if you are sure it will be profitable. Not sure how you would implement it, but I think that you should keep going with updates!

One of my favorite board games. Really good translation to the digital format. Some of the maps are super tiny and the switch between portrait land landscape mode can be glitchy. Playing on a larger device makes this better. Add ons are a little pricy. But otherwise, it's a great game.
replyContent: Thank you so much for the love and support! We've taken note of your feedback as well, so thank you for sharing it with us. We're glad to count you in our community :)

content: Good game however I can't seem to purchase any of the extra boards, so I'm stuck with the EU one

What a dishonest tracking app! So you pay for the app. And you pay for the maps. And if you are not online to let the app track you and your data you lose access to everything you paid for. Worse than Google, and Google does not ask you for money for every item.
Happy
replyContent: We are truly happy that you enjoyed our game. Thank you so much for your evaluation. Your praise motivates us so much!

content: Solid adaptation. The biggest problem though is people quitting midgame since they are only replaced by a bot when their timer runs out completely, which wastes everyone else's time. A possible solution is to replace a player after 2 minutes of inactivity until they rejoin the game.

A bit too small to play on a mobile phone but it is ok on an Android tablet and Chromebook. It does tend to crash under certain scenarios when trying to join games but once the game starts it's reasonable. The UI could do with a bit of a refresh around starting games as it seems a bit clunky. I don't know if they have stopped development as no updates since July 2020.

I used to love playing the India version of this game, but the last update wrecked it. The game board seems to have shifted so that there is a big empty gap at the top and the cards are half off the screen. I also can't place cars on the edge of the screen (my phone is a Samsung Note 20 ultra with an amoled screen). Please fix these issues so I can give it a better rating.
replyContent:
We're very sorry you've encountered this issue! Please contact us at https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/ticket-to-ride/?contact=1 with your details so we can help! Include your Asmodee username and device information.
Thank you!

content: This is a great adaptation of the modern board game classic Ticket to Ride into an app. Very intuitive to play even as a beginner. And if you are at home, it includes a pass and play version to play on the same device. Definitely recommended.

content: Any chance Rails and Sails will become available!?

content: I don't want to give the app permission to access my photos, media, etc. but it apparently won't. Open unless I do. Is that correct? Why does it need these permissions to operate. I cancelled my purchase because of this which is sad because I wanted to play online with distant family members. What options are there for playing without giving permissions?
replyContent: Because TTR is a large app, it is packaged in two pieces in the GGP Store. To load the second piece, the app requires files access privileges. So it's not about accessing your photos (which the app does not care about), it's about loading this large second piece of data! We care to precise we are GDPR compliant, so no risk there :)

content: This **board game** requires permissions to your photos to simply launch the app. This is malware and should not be installed.
replyContent:
Since TTR is a large app, it is packaged in two pieces. To load the 2nd part, the app requires files access; it's not about accessing your photos but about loading that 2nd part.
Android now provides a system that does not request these permissions. We are working on the re-architecturing of the app, but since it is significant, it's taking time!

I LOVE the Ticket to Ride physical board game, and I was excited when I saw it available on my phone. I purchased the USA board and the 1910 expansion. content: Downgrading my 2 star review to 1 star because this is the worst app I have ever used. It loses my login details frequently and after trying many times to play an online game we've given up because every time it loses at least one of the human players mid-game and replaces them with an AI. Also the game is glitch and has no option to undo (or confirm) your move so when it glitches you're stuck with whatever screw up its done. Avoid at all costs!

***Update*** The updates in the last few years have made this app exceptional! The only improvements I could suggest would be a snappier menu, and a better ai/human switch. It's just not super intuitive. However, overall, it's great.

content: Fantastic game, and a great one to play with the kids in Pass n' Play mode.
replyContent:
This is an installation issue, which can be fixed with this procedure :
1. Uninstall the app
2. Clear the data and cache from the Google Play Store
3. Clear the data and cache from the Download Manager
4. Restart the phone
5. Re-install the app

content: This app can be great when you're playing a basic game with people who want to play a game. But I keep running into issues when I'm playing online where somebody leaves a game, but doesn't properly exit the game. The rest of us are left hanging...do we wait 15 minutes for them to time out and get replaced by a Bot? Do we all abort the game? There's no way for us to skip them after a couple of minutes. If the game is set up for the Bot to auto replace, do you lose the game if you happen to leave the app for 2 minutes? I'm also having a bit of difficulty understanding some of the basics of how the app works. If somebody is online, there's usually a green dot. But what do the yellow and red ones mean? When inviting friends to play, one of them constantly gets kicked out with a notice about timing out. When playing a Solo game with multiple bots, is there a way to slow them down so you can pay attention to what cards each is drawing or what tracks they're laying? Can you explain certain details specific to the app such as: karma points, ranked games, when joining an online game how do you know how many people are playing, how do you know if a player is more likely to stay in a game or leave a game early, something that looks like a horizontal stop light with 5 lights, why do my friends and I have different colors while we are playing the same game, and the list could go on. Also, is it possible to play this on a computer instead of just your phone?
Fun, crashs sometimes
This game once again gets a 5 star review. Quality game the can be zone out or super competitive.

Hello Heidi,

Thank you for your feedback. We wanted this feature for the new players but realized it was not a validated option for the community. So we decided to remove the banner!
Please make sure to keep your app up to date, and the banner will soon be gone!

Thank you,
Asmodee Digital Support

I've been playing this app for a year or more but there seems to have been an update or something today which results in a massively intrusive and unnecessary black pop-up bar every turn. Unless this is fixed soon I will be uninstalling because it ruins my game experience. Otherwise this is a really good app. UPDATE: they removed the pop-up bar after it got too many complaints, so now this is a great app again and I play pretty much every day. Changed from 1 to 5 stars.

content: Excellent mobile version

I love this game but this app is super glitchy. The time lags between players and sometimes it's been my turn for a long while but on my screen it still says it's the other players turn. I've been booted from games waiting for someone else to go, but really it was my turn all along. I watch the plays a lot closer now and if I know it's supposed to be my turn I shut off the app and have to "resume" my game to take my turn. My husband and I also like to play together online with other people but whenever I create a game or he creates a game we don't see that option pop up on our "join a game" screen. Even though other people are able to see and join whatever game is created. Also, the navigation screens have so many embellishments that it's too busy for my eyes.and makes it hard to navigate. Once you figure it all out the set-up goes faster but this game set-up is not at all intuitive.And last thing, the timer keeps counting down even when you can't do anything yet or if they are showing you what route you just completed. In the more competitive games, every second counts and there's no time to waste!

It's a good game and I play it often. However, they keep dinking with the interface, throwing up annoying indicators it's your turn. The last time they did this, it changed back pretty quickly. So, I'm surprised they did it again. Pay attention to that feedback! Second, every so often an update resets my volume preferences and what I thought was going to be a quiet diversion starts loudly playing ragtime. Not cool.

Great game. My only problem now is the turn banner taking up the whole screen. I can't see the routes or my cards while it is up. It is definitely in the way and shows down play considerably. I'm not sure what was wring with the old way. Maybe changing it to a small circle in the middle of the screen would be fine. Thoroughly enjoyable otherwise.
replyContent:
Hello Joseph, Thank you for your feedback! We thought the banner was a good feature for new players, but we understood it was not so great. We decided to remove it! Please keep your app up to date as the banner will soon be gone!

Thank you,
Asmodee Digital Support

content: When this app works it's great. However it is so buggy! I can't log in on my phone, so I don't have access to all of the games I've bought - it has just randomly locked them. Annoying "banner" now appears every time it's your turn. Very distracting and slows my gameplay.
Not a fan of the new turn banner.
Great game

This is great as a board game; not so great as an app. It's constantly kicking me back to the home screen, so I have to go through a half-dozen screens to get back into my game almost ever other turn. It also crashes fairly regularly, or the notifications stop working because I briefly lost my Internet connection, so I don't realize it's my turn, or it stops to revalidate my download yet again, or it cuts to a black screen for long periods of time. Even when it's working, it's pretty clunky, with a bunch of little things that don't work as smoothly as they should, and some important details that are not made clear in the app design or instructions. I'm using this on a Samsung phone, so it might work better on tablets. I'm still enjoying playing this game with friends during quarantine, but I'm enjoying the game in spite of the app, not because of it. I guess I'd still recommend the app if you like the board game and don't have a way to play in person, but I'd also recommend you switch to a better app or version of this game online as soon as you find one.

content: Ticket to Ride is one of my favorite board games and this phone version is fun for online play ONLY if all the players actually play and there are no bots. Three big issues: 1) people can wait for their entire turn (7min or more!) and the game doesn't progress 2) if a player leaves, they're replaced by bots. And the bot AI isn't great. 3) your turn timer/counter starts decreasing when a bot goes ahead of you. This means you can lose valuable time when playing a short-turn game.

One of the best adaptations of a board game out there. True to form.
Its fun
Love this game..easy to learn and fun
So great to be able to play Ticket to Ride digitally! Love it.

The timer had glitch issues. Every game it counts form my time when it's the opponents. Only 25-50 people online/in the lobby on a weekend evening. Music is fine but repeats every five seconds. You need to create a room as you need 20+ points games to play in another room, or most buy maps, grr. At least opponents join my room within half a minute. The app is handy for confirming things, but there is no undo. The time limit is useful, 10 minutes I recommend. But with the app glitches,+mins
replyContent:
Hello,

Thank you for your feedback. If you encounter any issue, don't hesitate to send us a message here: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/ticket-to-ride/ 

Best regards,

Asmodee Digital Support

content: Much better after the last updates. The major issue with this game is still the scoring system. Once you get over about 1600 there aren't enough players with a similar rank to play with, and a loss against a weaker player is punitive. Winning a 4 player game gives you fewer points than someone who comes a distant second. And the margin by which is won should be taken into consideration in the scoring. One niggle is the black bar that drops down and covers the top of the map. But much improved
replyContent:

content: I love having this game available on my mobile device. It matches up with the tabletop version really well and is mostly easy to use. Sometimes dragging trains onto a route doesn't register (can take a few tries). I haven't had trouble connecting with my friends in a while, so that seems to be improved. Now, the game loses a star for the AI gameplay. For a while, it was ok, but for the last year or so, the AI plays like an angry child without any intentions of winning. Watching them go in circles seemingly to block a route is frustrating, especially when the end stats show they didn't complete a single route. Not any where close. Still, it is worth having, and I am glad to play it with my real people.

Have you tried modifying the bot you're playing against ?
Each of them has a different behaviour !

Thank you.
Best regards,

It will draw until every permutation of 3 wilds on the board is exhausted

I used to love this game until maybe about a year ago when more than half of my achievments were deleted and even now everytime I click on one to see what I need to do to get it, it just flashes it and then shows nothing and keeps showing the reload icon on the side. content: Board games don't come much better or more fun than this.

There were some issues at first but they've been fixed and the game is working great. Very fun and one of the few game apps I enjoy. *Removed two stars. The game constantly signs me out and everytime I go to play on my phone, I need to sign back in but it won't accept my login or password and I have to go through the hassle of resetting everything again- even though I KNOW I have the right information and I've chosen to stay signed in. It's some sort of annoying glitch.

content: App works great on my P30 Pro. Been playing for a few months with no issues. No crashes nothing. If you love TTR then get this. Love playing the AI, but online is easy to get a game. Having the various expansions is really good as well.
The app was working fine and I enjoy the game. But now for some reason I can't play online.
Updated. Mid game it reverted to an old version. Frustrating

Why does this app request to: "Create, edit, and delete your Google Play Games activity" all other games i have do not request this permission and i'm concerned as to why this is needed. (Edit) After the response I have turned off the achievements function and the app still works great :)
replyContent:
Hi Philip,
I guess this is the text for the authorisation to publish achievements on Google Play Games. If you don't allow this, the game will work fine, and just not publish the achievements you will unlock. This is not mandatory, so don't bother with this and just answer No if you don't want, it's perfectly fine.

During the last turn, you often have only a few cars left in your reserve, for instance when you trigger the end of the game, . In such a case, you cannot claim a route longer than the number of cars that you have left (because alike the actual tabletop game, you must place one car on each slot of the route you are claiming)

content: TTR is a great game, I thoroughly enjoy it. I'm not a fan of the chess-style ranking system. Doesn't adapt well to a game with randomness like drawing cards, I can lose 100 pts easy just from bad luck. Also super buggy; it's not uncommon to get kicked out for no reason or to lose sync. Also I get random notifications that say "TTR Needs Your Attention" seemingly for no reason; when i open the app, there's nothing new or unusual. I hope they resolve this app's many bugs, I want to like it a lot!

Great Game! My only complaint is the lack of an option for better visuals. It would be nice to have a mode thst takes notes from the Carcassonne app with 3d rendering. Also, there ought to be a screen that blocks the next player's hand in pass and play until a button is pressed to confirm the game has been passed. Otherwise, this is basically a perfect port of a great board game

Love this game but I have experienced a lot of bugs since downloading. Lots of times it shows games on online mode but when I try to join, I get error "player not in lobby", and get the same error when I try to create a game. Additionally, out of 20 games online, I have had the game terminate on me and not let me resume 4 times. Please fix these bugs and would be 5 stars.

I keep getting errors for no reason. Client and server out of sync?? Client not in lobby - mid game?? I haven't played enough ranked games but I've played over 100 games?? Access denied? content: Good, but buggy. One of my favourite games, but sadly not perfect. It crashes a lot especially when doing the final scoring. The online lobby needs more filtering - remove games I am ineligible to join and allow me to filter by number of players (I don't like the 2 player game).

why do you need access to my personal files and photos? I refuse to let you access these and so i cannot use the game at all. why is this?
replyContent:
Hi Emma,
The app does not try to access your files and photos. But it needs some room to write data on your device. The Authorisation to access the storage system makes no difference between your data and the room for the app, so it looks like the game wants your personal data, but it's not correct. It only needs room for its own data.

Was a 5 star now closer to a 1 after the recent major update. The new animations take forever. Cards new layout sucks. Worst of all though is the AI for computer players. It seems like now they make weird moves and highly prioritize getting to 2 or less cars remaining as fast as possible. Every game I play now has 5 to 10 fewer turns. Getting a cross-country route completed is nearly impossible unless every turn lines up perfectly, yet I used to get multiple cross-country routes done per game.
have to buy expansions or be a certain rank to play online...so unless you want to play usa with bots over and over again don't bother. if i knew that i wouldnt have wasted my money
replyContent:
Hi Fiona,
You don't have to purchase anything more to play online. But you do need a minimum Karma, which only raises when ... you play online. And I see your point. We'll improve that. In the meantime, you can create games online, and others will join you.

content: The game stopped working completely. It tells me to continue using to download and won't  do so.
replyContent:
This is an installation issue, which can be fixed with this procedure :
1. Uninstall the app
2. Clear the data and cache from the Google Play Store
3. Clear the data and cache from the Download Manager
4. Restart the phone
5. Re-install the app

content: The last update introduced a lot of drag and lag to the game as well as some bugs. The lag and bugs are in the game regardless of playing speed, and come in at the end of the game before the final score animations (very bad lag), and then again when tapping to quit (exit bug).
replyContent:
Hi Tess,

In the last update, we added a lot of animations in order to help new players and make the rules more visual. But it might feel useless for expert players. That's why we added a speed option in the settings. Please try to switch it on, and then give us your feedback if something is still bothering you. We will try to address it.

Thanks.

There is a bug. If you finished the game with 0 trains, system still wants you to make a final turn, but you cannot, since you have 0 trains.
replyContent:
Hi Viktor,
This is no bug. It's the rules of the game: as a player ends his turn with 2 trains or less, every player including him plays one more turn. Then the game is over. During that last turn you can draw more destination tickets, if you are a gambler :) 
Otherwise, if you are a chicken :) , just draw color cards and finish the turn.

content: I am definitely *not* a fan of how the cards display after the update. In addition, the game is slower due to the fact that it places one car at a time when you select a route. I liked it MUCH better before the update.
replyContent:
Hi Mary,

We did this change so that it's easier for new players to understand the rules. But I understand your point, expert players want to play fast. We added an option in the settings to speed up the pace of the game. Could you please try to switch it on? And if that is still not satisfying, please contact our support and we'll talk about it :)

Hi Danita,
In the lat turn you often cannot claim route, due to not enough cars or not enough colour cards, or no route for 1 or 2 slots remaining. In such a case (in any case, actually), you can either draw more destinations, hoping that one of them will already be completed by your routes network, or simply draw 2 colour cards to finish your turn

This is an installation issue. It can be fixed with this procedure :
1. Uninstall the app
2. Clear the data and cache from the Google Play Store
3. Clear the data and cache from the Download Manager
4. Restart the phone
5. Re-install the app

Fire developers who worked on this app! My cat would develop a better AI

Before I begin, I'd just like to say I'd give five stars to the game 
itself. I've been a fan of the tabletop version for years, and upon hearing 
there was an app, I got excited, because that meant being able to play one 
of my favorite games on the go for long road trips. Playing it with two 
other people (or more) in the "Pass N Play" mode is excellent. The 
experience mostly transfers over from the tabletop game, though it is more 
difficult to gage where your opponents are going, and how to block them, 
since you can't directly see the colored cards they're picking up from the 
face up cards, which makes the overall experience less competitive and more 
time killing casual. And that's fine, it's still fun. However, there's a 
host of issues with the online functionality that ruins the experience. The 
app crashes often enough for it to not be completely irregular, players 
will drop out of games unexpectedly, sometimes the you'll get kicked out of 
games, there's syncing issues with the timers which will unfairly replace 
you with a bot in the middle of a game, and so much more. The online 
functionality of this app is downright terrible, which is a shame coming 
from a paid app.
I love this game, but I hate how they charge for everything.

I love playing this version of Ticket to Ride! One thing I'd like to see in 
an update is an option to allow claiming parallel routes with any number of 
players. This is a house rule that many of us play in the board game. Also, 
sometimes I cannot press the Accept button when I am about to join 
someone's invite. So I restart the app then it works. All in all, a very 
fun game!
Too many bugs! Gameplay stops randomly.

While the gameplay is excellent (it's based off of a wonderful board game), there is an Achilles heel with the controls, at least for most Android devices.  In Pass-and-play mode (and presumably the other modes as well), if you press and hold the back button, the game will completely exit, with no way to recover the ongoing game.  The can happen quite easily as you are passing the device around from player to player, especially since most Android devices have a "touchscreen" style back button that does not require an actual press, but only a touch.  It would be easy to fix:  Just require multiple presses (not a press-and-hold) to exit out of the game, or require the player to confirm they want to exit with a pop-up asking "Are you sure you want to quit?"  It was very frustrating to be playing the game for several minutes, just to watch our progress completely disappear when the tablet was handed to me and I held it in the wrong way (my thumb on the back button).  Please fix this otherwise awesome game!  Edit: the developers still have not fixed this annoying bug! They really need to confirm that you want to exit the pass-and-play game, instead of allowing a temporary touch of the back button to exit the game without the ability to recover it.  Update: I see the developers still have not fixed this terrible bug, and many games are being aborted with no chance of recovery.  Avoid this game until they fix it.

This is an installation issue, which can be fixed with this procedure :
1. Uninstall the app
2. Clear the data and cache from the Google Play Store
3. Clear the data and cache from the Download Manager
4. Restart the phone
5. Re-install the app

content: After the recent update I've seen a bug - in solo play, when the last AI takes its last turn, if it attempted to build a tunnel, the game transitions to the final scoring screen before the cards the AI played, and the 3 cards revealed for the tunnel, are removed from the board, and so those cards just sit there all throughout scoring and even on the final standings screen. The cards only go away when you return to menu.  I've only tried solo play and pass and play thus far, and it works great. I'd love the game even more if there was a way to disable the "it's your turn" messages. They're annoying and distracting; I know it's my turn, I just want to think for a moment! Also, the AI seems to favor train card hoarding, and it's not fun to have nothing but locomotives in the deck because 4 AIs have taken everything else. I also wish the AI opponents learned to build stations on the Europe map.

content: The game itself is very well realised and is a lot of fun to play. It's clear a lot of effort has been put into this port and it's very well developed.   My only issue with it is the cost of content. So that prospective customers know what to expect, I bought this in a sale for around ¬£1.79 (it's seemingly around ¬£6.99 normally). You get access to just one map (US) and all the other content costs between 79p for add ons and ¬£4.50 for new maps. What you're getting really is just a taster of the game and considering it's usually 7 quid that's a very expensive premium priced taster. I get that the IAP model is the current model for a lot of apps but there is a decision developers make about how much content to offer for the up front price and if you buy this app for 7 quid then you might feel like it's not enough of an offering.  That said, the pricing model reflects what you would expect from the physical copy of the game with add on packs costing extra so it basically comes down to knowing what to expect from your purchase (which I've hopefully outlined above).

content: Best game ever!

Got online to work. Go to settings and find the option to change app permissions. It's different depending on firmware/model of your phone. The permission that needs changing is the 1 about viewing your contacts. Once the game starts, do NOT allow the permission to view your contacts and continue the game. You should now be able to login/signup and play online.  Please get this post to near the top so more players are online. Select helpful if this works for you so people won't be wasting their time with the vague fix the devs posted

I regret ever spending money on products made by this company. Fine if your playing against others but the AI will always know what cards you have and generally what your going to do.  You can place one token on one end of the board and it will place the perfect blocking token on the other end.  Statistically, it's almost impossible for an AI to do this time and again, unless the idotic software engineers decided to allow their AI access to player knowledge which makes the game moot and yet the company does not inform purchasers prior to spending money.  By the time customers are aware of the ruise, it will be too late for an eletronic refund.  This is very "shity" buisness practices.  This is why I no longer support days of wonder products.
replyContent:
Hello, 

Sorry that the game didn't work for you. 
Please note that: the AI is not "cheating", they have the same access to information as any player during the game.
If you wanna talk about this, don't hesitate to contact the support: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/ticket-to-ride/

Best regards,

content: I love the app version of this game. I use it to practice before playing the board game with friends.  Only one glitch: when too many cards are drawn leaving only wild cards (locomotives) there is a loop counter for when you have to display three or more locomotives, but there isn't anything to protect against having only five locomotives in the draw pile after one non-locomotive card is drawn.  When that happens, the game doesn't know what to do, and gameplay can't proceed because there are no legal moves remaining.
replyContent: When 3 loco cards are visible the app is supposed to re-deal the visible cards and stop dealing if it gets 3 locos or more 3 times in a row. If it does not work, it's a bug. We'll check that. Thank you for the report.

content: AVOID. The game itself is fun and somewhat addictive BUT the app is completely itchy and buggy on Android -- there are frequent disconnects from the server, and random "End of File" errors (whatever that means) in the middle of the game.  To add insult to injury, when the game freezes/crashes or kicks you out, it treats it as if you QUIT, significantly lowering your "karma" points, and thus making even MORE difficult to join a game to play. So, in short, it punishes you for its own bugs and server errors!
replyContent:
hello Matthew, 

We are sorry about those issues. 
Please note that the team is currently working on an update.
Before that, when this happens you may use this workaround: quit and relaunch the app before joining again. 
Don't hesitate to contact the support: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/ticket-to-ride/

Again sorry about this, 

best regards,

content: Great game and a faithful representation. Two things I'd improve are 1) having the option to have just the "your turn" sound effect turned up (and/or maybe a vibrate notification?) when playing a local or online game with two or more players are in the same room, and 2) indicating a ticket as being "done" when the placement of a station has successfully completed the ticket. Mark it differently to "properly" completed tickets if you must but don't leave them looking like they still require attention. Thanks

content: Impatient bots are annoying but it's really close to the actual game
Board game delight

The game is fun when it works as expected, but far too often that's not the case. For example, just moments ago I lost yet another game because it wouldn't let me place cards where I had more than enough, telling me that I didn't have enough to complete the route (in this case, I had six white cards, but it wouldn't let me place them either on the open 6-white route or any other allowed route of more than two spaces). Very disappointing, especially for such a relatively expensive game.
replyContent: It's not a bug. At the end of the game, you are often limited by the number of pawns you have left in your reserve. So even with the right number of cards, you might not be able to claim a long route. i.e. if you trigger the end of the game, you only have 2 pawns or less in reserve, so you can not claim a route longer than 1 or 2 slots.

content: Hate the new minimum 7 minute time limit!!!!! Bring back 4 minutes!!!!!             There ARE many players who are advanced and play 4 minute games. 7 minutes doesn't necessarily stop stalling - just means you have to wait longer when certain players do stall. Why not give people the flexibility to choose? If you give them days to play, should also offer 4 minutes to those who prefer a quick game. 7 minutes is almost TWICE as long as the previous minimum time.
replyContent: 4 minutes is too short for most players, and on low-end devices you can hardly complete a game in 4 mintues. The limit is there to prevent stalling, not to blame players who do play the game until the end. Hence the 7 minutes.

replyContent: This is not a bug. At the end of the game, you often have only a few pawns in your hand, and you are limited to route of that many slots or less. It's the way the physical boardgame works.

and 1912 should be available.

For a refund, contact us : www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital

content: When an online game freezes up, we quit and move to local (wifi) mode. And vice-versa :-)
This is by far the best game ever!  Keep the online versions coming.
Great version of the hard copy
Edit: it's working again.  This game is awesome.
replyContent:
This is an installation issue, which can be fixed with this procedure :
1. Uninstall the app
2. Clear the data and cache from the Google Play Store
3. Clear the data and cache from the Download Manager
4. Restart the phone
5. Re-install the app

content: The free drop of 3 extra expansions for buying previous maps (got them all) is delightful. One of the classic board games fully realised, and then some, for fast fun without coordinating friends.
Love it.
I would like to actually buy some of the expansions but with no way to log out of the Google profile or recover the game profile I'm not going to buy it over again.  Blech.
replyContent: I do not understand your issue. Please contact the support so we can help : www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital

content: Great game!  Played for a little over a week, bought expansion packs, and now the game crashes and exits itself!  I emailed support, got an automated response and then an email to reset my days of wonder password.  I uninstalled and reinstalled the game several times and the problem persists.  Please help!

TTR is my favorite boardgame of all time and the Android rendition is spot on!  You can play real people online or some challenging AI in solo play.  The programmers are currently working on adding all their expansion maps as an in-app purchases (including 1912 for US and UK).  Extremely affordable and worth every penny!!!

You can play 4 different ways: solo, online, pass and play, and even networked with other people in your house. It makes the game faster to do it digitally so we can play more games than the board game. The online aspect goes back and forth with having bugs and being fine, if you can get past that then you can soar down the track of Ticket to Ride and have a blast!
The game is great and the digital adaptation is very well implemented, active multiplayer and it still gets updated!
Won't gimme a refund you jerks
replyContent: We will refund your purchase, no problem. We just need to know your Google Play account ID or your purchase ID. Please send us the refund request so we can help : www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital

content: You can't pick up additional ticket cards in this game. This is a key part of the game that shouldn't be missing and completely affects strategy. The game is also a bit buggy, but runs well enough. Please send an update with the ability to pick up ticket cards and I would be willing to push this up to 4 stars.
I don't want to sign up or in to Google Play Games in order to play a game by myself on my device. And why does the app need to verify the download everytime? It's most annoying.
replyContent: Point taken. We'll do something about it.

content: I bought several of the DLCs because the game plays well. But, after the latest update, i can no longer access the DLCs that I paid for.

replyContent: Please contact the support so we can help : www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital

content: If you like the game you'll like the app!
My go to digital board game. A great digital version. Wish all the physical sets were available!

I love Ticket To Ride. Been playing it for over a decade. I however am disgusted by Days of Wonders blatant false advertising. The Nordic DLC charges $2.99 but is advertised on DOW webpage as 50%off & an email I got today says it is 40%off. Which is it!? What is the actual price!? Why is this company nickel & diming its customers? Don't have a sale then charge full price! Its been a month the price he been $2.99. Its too long for this to be a mistake & not intentional fraud.
replyContent:
The actual price of Nordic Countries is 4.99 but we offer a 40% discount for a limit period. And there is a pack of expansions (1910, Europe, Legendary Asia and Nordic Countries) worth around 10 but discounted 50%.

Sorry if the prices are confusing. We'll try to rephrase and make it clear.

content: very very good ive been playing this game for years

Unable to favorite friends, can't change my online name from "Player....." and the merge accounts online doesn't work. Guess I expected more from a $7 app.
For whatever reason I can't invite buddies to play. The game appears on my phone but not on theirs.
replyContent:
Paul, we are investigating this Access Denied error. Please contact us and give us more details : www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital

Thanks

content: it's amazing how much more quickly you can play this game when not physically moving the cars around and trying to do math and waiting on the 8 year old to figure out what she's doing.. another bonus, i haven't yet had to get the computer to stop crying when i beat it by 80 points..
This is a real boredom buster for me :)

I love this app! This is my favorite game, but my family doesn't have a lot of time to drag out the board and pieces. My husband and I both have the app and all the extensions. While sitting in restaurants, in the doctors office, and even at home we challenge each other, set up a pass n play game, or play solo games every day. You can choose up various CPU characters to play against or go online and challenge an opponent. It was worth the price two fold. So glad we found the app!
I love the game and play it a lot. After update the gameplay is slow and not as smooth anymore.
The best card game out there. The game play is terrific.
Way better then playing the board game. No set up and take down.

I like this game

content: It would be a lot better if the computer players actually used strategy and try to complete their tracks. All the computer does is try to get all the 6 and 5 car tracks. The other game options are great. I like the network game.

content: One small issue, notifications do not work on Marshmallow, nor does the next game flag for online gameplay. I'd like these issues fixed. Otherwise a great implementation of a board game one of my favorites on Android.

content: I have purchased all the maps that makes my game look even better with so much options. The experience especially online is top notch. You can play via 3g or wifi locally, globally and even observe others playing the game till the end where the score is tallied.
Excellent!

Very good rendition of the actual game. Sometimes placing a train can be a bit finicky, but that's a very minor complaint. Great way to learn the game before getting the table top version, and great way to keep up the practice!

Playing several players  on same device works.
The only thing that could be better is if I were playing it in real life!
Great tablet version of the awesome boardgames! A few bugs needs to be smoothed out then ill give it 5 stars.

content: I have an android tablet and paid to download the app. Had 2 noticeable issues. First I am noticing a lot of times when I'm supposed to be getting 2 cards it will only let me get 1 before the auto player goes. That's no biggie I'm sure yall will fix sometime. But the biggest thing is why I could not play online with someone other than a computer auto player. I am online with wifi. I have a user name and password but there is no where to let me type it in. And furthermore it kept authenticating and saying automatic access denied.. I complained on here and the told me to call support but amazingly they fixed it right away! What great customers support! I love this game! Can't wait to get more route cards. Thank u
replyContent:
Thanks for your updated review :)

Note : we you draw a Loco, you can not draw another card during the same turn. Maybe that's what happens when you get only 1 card. Otherwise, do not hesitate to report that and we'll investigate:
www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital

content: Minus one star because the app crashes semi-frequently. This has been improving with recent updates and I hope it will soon be reliable
replyContent:
Thanks. We are indeed working at fixing and tweaking the app. Do not hesitate and tell us when you spot a crash : www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital

Thank you.

content: You only get one map and you have to buy all the others separately.  I paid 6.99 for this app that should have included all the content, let's face it this app isn't mind blowing game development with cutting edge graphics and physics... It's a board game app and shouldn't have cost that much to begin with let alone charging for more than ONE map.
replyContent: If you want a refund, no problem, contact our support : www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital

content: The app is very more stable. The only issue I have now is the very low karma rating which prevents me of joining some games.
replyContent:
Sorry about that. We are indeed working on the issues that get reported to our support : 
www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital

Updates will be released on a regular basis. Thank you for your patience.

content: Love this game :)

Old version better. I purchased expansion maps on android for old version and new version won't let me access them. Very disappointing. Even graphics on "upgrade" are lacklustre compared to the lush steam punk old ones. When game works properly it's great.
The whole family loves this game
It's easy enough to play and I have had no complaints. I like that there are additional challenges that help make sure you can't get bored.

Buggy online, I was timed out for my move because cards just would not register on route I picked, ie. drag and drop is moody.  This was well before the 2-ish minute timeout!  Buggy achievements, I've had 6 ticket achievement in normal game at least twice now but it just will not register on achievement board.  The whole game sort of feels like it was slapped together in some game creator program by game dev newbs.  It's not what I'd expect from a paid app.  Fun game, though!  And I'm happy it's mobile!
replyContent:
There is a problem sometimes when recording achievements. We are investigating.

Regarding the other issue, the "cards just would not register on route I picked", often at the end of the game you don't have enough pawns left to claim a route.

Otherwise, could you contact our support for more details : www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital

Thanks.

content: Like the new version, but even with music turned off in the app whenever I open the game it pauses the music I'm playing in another app. Can this be prevented?
replyContent: We are going to address this. Thanks for your feedback.

content: I don't like since the new version came out I seem to have lost the other maps I paid money for with the older version.
replyContent: All the maps you purcahsed should still be available. Please contact us so we can help : www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital

content: I have lost track of the number of huge upgrades lately and still I get access denied errors when I try and logon and still cannot access network games. Just gave this one star as I've not got any feedback on my support ticket which was placed before I made this review and then supplied the info requested then no contact even after I asked how it had progressed. As stated I have contacted support and nothing is happening.
replyContent: Please contact our support so we can investigate and help :www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital

content: Addicting!  Haven't stopped playing for days!  Only issue is that even though the achievement is complete and it tells you it is complete, the achievement is not completed in the achievement list.
replyContent: We are investigating this achievement recording issue. Thanks for your patience.

content: Would love to play. But since update it no longer believes I own the game.  Have tried the steps suggested, clearing cache in pretty much every app/appstore service,  download manager, and uninstalling/reinstall. Short of wiping my phone, I don't think theres much more I can do. And no, I'm not wiping my phone to get an app to play. If this is a known issue, surely there should be a fix? I've never come across another app that has required this sort of hoop leaping to install.
replyContent:
This is an installation issue due to Google Play. It can be fixed with this procedure :
1. Uninstall the app
2. Clear the data and cache from the Google Play Store
3. Clear the data and cache from the Download Manager
4. Restart the phone
5. Re-install the app

Update : 
please contact us so we can help : www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital

My wife and I play this game almost everyday. It gets so competitive it's crazy we love this game

content: Great implementation of a great game.  Only 2 complaints:  1) it takes too long to load certain screens; and 2) like so many other games, this one shuts off outside music when started up, even if it's own sounds/music are turned off, preventing me from listening to my own music while playing the game.
replyContent: We are working on the music issue. Thanks for your feedback.

content: Having only a subset of the tickets used in the physical game severely limits the replayability of this game.

content: So much fun.  One of the best purchases I have ever made.

I don't understand why the game's interface was changed.  I know that several programmers spent many hours working to improve the game and it does look good, but the old version looked and played better.  I'm having trouble with the touch interface and I play on a note, it's not like I have a small screen.  Never had any issues with the old version.  The layout was better on the previous version as well.  It feels shrunken and crammed together now.  If it's not broken, why "fix" it?  Was 4 stars...
replyContent:
The former version had issues (remember Alvin error?)
It now has achievements, phone screen support, support vertical maps, like India, etc

So yes, the app needed a rework.

But the update needs more debugging and fine tuning. We are doing this. And feedback is welcome. Please contact www.daysofwonder.com/support/digital and give us your requests.

content: Easy to use and since the new look the disconnections are non existent and if you do disconnect you can resume the game. Good update.

It will authenticate forever and not work on online mode also it'd be nice if there was a vibrate setting when its your turn that would be nice also love the game but I can only give one star with the issues it has
replyContent:
Please contact the support so we can investigate and record your feedback 
www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital 
Thank you.

content: Just an amazing app version of a board game. Well done. Some issues, such as longest rail not working in some variants (even though the help says it should be in it) but nothing game breaking or frustrating.
It would be better if app to sd is supported to save storage space
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. It will be possible to move it to the SD card in the next update, 2.0.13

content: The adaptation is fine, though the varioys bots show far too little cariation in playstyle (rarely playing for more routes for example). Also the app is horribly bloated and as I have little space on my tablet updating is a nightmare every time.
Too bad it cannot be moved to SD card
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. The app can now be installed on SD Card. Please update and enjoy :)

content: I actually fell in love with this game back when it was on the Days of Wonder Online games section. Some friends kept talking about it and convinced me to try it out and I was hooked. Got the boardgame and it became a gaming group favorite when boardgames were on the evening. I bought the PC version which eventually transitioned over to the Steam service. When the game showed up on Android, I bought a copy and still enjoy playing, it's a faithful port of the Steam version and pretty easy to work with. The only thing that would make the game better is Marklin allowing Days of Wonder to bring the Marklin edition to the video game versions, but I doubt it'll happen anytime soon as licensing agreements are always prickly about such things.

A few issues I have with the app: the sensitivity for targeting tracks to lay down trains is inconsistent. All too often you simply cannot get them to go into place and just get that awful buzzer sound. The app doesn't allow for music outside the app. I need my Spotify! It's really tough to pause and leave the app. Trying to pull out the Android utility drawer often results in drawing cards accidentally. Sleeping the phone from the app should be a decent workaround but the app fights back and chokes it.
replyContent: Point taken. Thanks for your feedback

content: Game sometimes crashes, but reloads nicely afterwords. Great gameplay.

I play single player games against the AI. I KNOW it's my turn, I KNOW I need to pick another card, I don't need to be reminded of that every 10 seconds! Also I'd prefer to decide if I want to log in, rather than have the game try to do this every time I start it.
replyContent: Points taken. Thanks for your feedback

content: The game itself is fun and easy yo play. It plays exactly like the board game.  The only difficulty that I am having is that I am completing exactly what the achievements are, but I am not getting credit for them.
replyContent: There was a bug regarding achievement recording. It should be fixed in the next update. Thanks for your patience

content: Great fun!

My 8-year old loves playing the board game with me, but he finds it hard to hold all the cards you need to draw and he has trouble keeping track of where he's going in the off-line version.  This game for Android takes care of both those issues and we can play the game together like it's meant to be played using the local play feature.
Great adaptation of the table top game.
replyContent: Thank you for the updated review.

content: This is just like the board game. Love the ability to play with other players. The app works really well and is engaging...if not a bit addicting! Very easy to learn.
Please help,  I've loved playing this game but it will no longer open üò§

content: Samsung Galaxy S6. After two months Days of Wonder fixed the bug that doesn't let me play and now I can enjoy the game. It's fantastic.

Also, there is another issue with chatting. I have a Galaxy S5 and I cannot find the button to send messages, I can only type them. I tried in both tablet and phone view.  ________ I reset my phone and downloaded the app and that resolved the issue before the developer offered this advice. That is a testament to how great this game is, that I am willing to reset my phone over it! Hopefully the steps provided by the developer can help others with the issue I was facing.

content: I love this game very very very much! In fact I love it so much I bought all the expansion packs for it after playing my first game! My only concern or problem is that I recently upgraded my phone so I had to reinstall the app and I can't seem to find a way to restore my purchases from my old phone (both are Android phones with the same Google Account signed in to both phones). Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!
Fell in love with this game over the holidays with the family and had to buy the board game and the app.
Wonderful game and wonderful app but too large for my phone.  If I could move it over to the Sd card storage I would but I can't so it will have to be Uninstalled.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. The app can now be installed on SD Card. Please update and enjoy :)

content: Great game! Though I unlocked a few achievements and they aren't appearing in my account (ex. Score 120+).  Please fix.
replyContent: We are working on this bug. Thanks for your patience.

content: I lost a game because it gave one of the bots the longest route by going around a loop and then backtracking. That should not count for longest route.
replyContent:
TL;DR :  loops are valid.

Long version :
This point has been discussed on our forums before :
http://www.daysofwonder.com/en/msg/?goto=7694#msg_7694

"the longest path means "longest path, which may go through a city multiple times as long as no section - ie connection between two adjacent cities - is covered twice". ie a loop is acceptable"

content: This app is TOO BIG to not be moveable to the SD card. It takes up too much room on very limited phone space. I've been asking for over a year: PLEASE make it moveable so I don't have to uninstall.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. With the recent update, you can now move the app to your SD Card. Please update, and enjoy :)

content: Absolutely love the board game, have most versions. Also love this game, played it on pc and boyfriend's iPhone, so really happy now also available on Android. However, it doesn't track my achievements properly. Huge disappointment for me, because that's where a lot of the fun lies for me  since I've played the game so much already. How can we fix that?
replyContent: We are working on this problem. Thank you for your patience.

content: Fun game.
replyContent: Thanks for the updated review.

content: Amazing artwork and full of features.  Really pleased with the game now that it is a fair bit more stable than it was.  Still not perfect though.
replyContent: We are still fixing bugs. Thanks for your updated review :)

content: Great game, can not put it down now I have the other maps

I love the board game so I found the solo play a great way to play on my own. I wish i would have downloaded sooner. Two bugs I keep experiencing: sometimes if I earn an achievement, the game will not save it in my records; also, sometimes the game will close out unexpectedly.
There are occasionally very serious bugs that affect networked play. But it is otherwise great fun!
replyContent: We are working on these bugs. Thanks for your feedback

content: It keeps stopping the download process and I get a message that states "Download failed because the  resources could not be found..."  Assistance would be wonderful...  My family and I were looking forward to playing this version as we own the boardgames.
replyContent:
This is an installation bug. Installation is operated by Google Play. The support of Google Play suggests that the problem would be solved by applying your device a "Reset to factory".

We are discussing with Google's developer support to tackle this problem with a better solution

content: If you are a fan of the boardgame, this won't disappoint. Playing with bots make game play go by quickly, often in 8-10 minutes. There are other maps you can buy that is well worth it offering you more ways to play. I highly recommend it.
Fun

The game, overall, is addictive and fun but I have lots of trouble with my last move if playing solo. I have enough, or more than enough, cards for a particular colored track to place but it says I do not have enough. Also, many times it won't let me place a color anywhere. Very frustrating!
replyContent:
In the last move, you often have enough cards but not enough pawns to claim a route. The pawns are counted at the bottom right of the screen.

Regarding the other problem, please contact our support so we can help :
www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital

content: The game is fun and addictive, but way too many crashes.  About 50% of my online games crash, and my Karma takes a hit each time.  Very frustrating.  I have a Nexus 6P and a Samsung Galaxy 4 tablet, and both devices are affected.  I hope this gets addressed in future updates.
replyContent:
Version 2.0.12 fixes a problem with Android games played on Android devices based on a CPU running arm64-v8a. There are relatively little of these devices. Among those, there are : Nexus 9, Nexus 6P.

One of the symptoms was that while it's the player's turn, on his device it looks like it's another player's turn. Sounds familiar ?

Please update.

content: I noticed a price increase and when my friends tried to download it also they rejected to pay.  Even I wouldn't pay.  Worth it if on sale.

I love the game and the online gaming part. It is very competitive and fun. But when I am listening to music and I load the app my music stops. I have tried multiple times and I think it would be better if you could play the game as well as listen to music.
replyContent: Point taken. Thanks for the feedback

content: This game is great, particularly because it takes advantage of the software platform to improve gameplay with things like highlighting cities. One thing I would love to see though is a blind spectator mode - enable someone to spectate without seeing anyone's hands or destination tickets - which would allow a Jackbox style party game with multiple players on their own device and a shared board on a large screen, while still allowing all of the forms of play currently available and being simple to implement.

Local game and achievements added, big improvement. Less $ for other maps then before. Dev clearly listens to feedback, so thanks for that.  Would love Bluetooth support for local game like on iPhone.
replyContent: Thanks for the updated review.

content: I love the game I put 2 cards on the board it won't stay And it skips my turn happened 3 times  every day
replyContent: Please contact the support so we can investigate : www.daysofwonder.com/contact/digital

content: Overall this game is very well done. Couple things though:  Please improve the chat feature. I cannot really get it to work well. Especially when I try to use a bluetooth keyboard. It gets really buggy with a bluetooth keyboard. Sometimes the screen goes black. Other times the chat screen gets stuck and I have to leave the game and come back for it to go away.  Overall, great fun. Thanks!
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback.

content: Very difficult to play one game without being kicked out of the game. I constantly have to quit games and I guess my karma is suffering for it. Used to love playing with my GF now we are just raging all the time. We have pretty much all the board games and we have paid over 50$ for this mobile game and we cannot play, very disappointing!  The game do look a lot better, but what's the point if you can't play. I hope they will fix this for good. Using a Samsung Note5 and Iphone6
replyContent: This is has been tackled. Please update to the newest version

content: Loved this up until I updated the app two days ago, now it will not open, stuck at black screen that wants to download resources but never connects and never downloads to be able to use the game now. Been using it for months with no issue up until this point. Will be 5 stars once this issue is fixed  --------------------------------------   Response to Days of Wonder: The App installs fine on my device. When I open the app, the black screen with the train appears, wanting to resume a download for some sort of resources. In previous versions of the app, I had this screen appear and it did what it had to do no problem. As soon as the update installed, I have had this issue. I even uninstalled and reinstalled the app completely and still have this issue. The only thing that has changed is the recent update to the app. Not sure how this would be a google issue...
replyContent:
Update :
The app comes in 2 parts because Google Play limits apk size to 100MB. Larger apps have to provide the rest of the app in a 2nd file. Please try this :
1. Uninstall the app
2. Clear the data and cache from the Google Play Store
3. Clear the data and cache from the Download Manager
4. Restart the phone
5. Re-install the app

content: These guys need to get their act together when it comes to online play. Two thirds of the games can never be completed do to crashes. Don't waste your money on this game.
replyContent:
We just spotted a serious issue with devices running an arm64-v8a, like yours. That causes the issues when playing online. We are working on that issue and the next update will tackle the problem.

in the meantime, please don't play online games. Thank you for your patience.

content: Love all the different maps, and quick play of a well loved board game!

content: Really like the game. It's simple yet very entertaining. A nice added feature is the accomplishments, unfortunately they don't seem to work that well (you complete the task and it doesn't give you the achievement... I'm not the only one with this issue). Overall a fun game

I love that this is such an easy game to learn and no two games are the same. The different boards are also well worth it to purchase to give some variety. The downside to this app are the karma points. While I love the premise, too often the app crashes. That deducts from your karma points and unfortunately, I don't think I will ever get more than 1, due to how often the app crashes on the Note5.

Pros: In regards to the regular USA map.  The game is fun, fast, addicting and saves you the hassle of dealing with all the tiny little pieces.  Cons: Eats through battery life at a hectic pace.  My friends with iPhone's confirm the same.   Finding your way through some of the menus is infuriating.  Want to play solo against the computer?  No problem.  Want to play a game with friends... or add friends?  Good luck!  The menu controls are unclear and difficult.  Good luck adding someone to your buddy list.  I have successfully added 2 people and would attribute that to blind luck and mashing the screen.... Fun game and easily a 4 or 5 but having so much difficulty trying to play it with friends hinders the flow and fun of the app.  I suggest some research into more intuitive controls/interface in the menus. Summary: Game is Awesome! Adding friends to a game is difficult.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. We'll improve that buddies management and invitation set-up

content: It seems pretty good. Looks great, stays true to the board games. Things are intuitive on how to accomplish stuff. I asked how to link my old account and you guys just gave me a link that doesn't even exist/work.

I changed my review from 1 star to 5 stars because they fixed the issues I had with the app. Ticket to Ride is a great game and this app is a lot of fun to play! If you are an experienced player and don't want to wait for the slow animations, make sure to change the animation speed setting to fast.
replyContent:
Yes you can : go to the settings screen (press More, and then Settings) and push the speed switch.

By the way we just released an update that tackles several bugs. I'd recommend you update the app.

content: Fantastic game!

content: This is a great game and I have already spent hours of down time trying to win on each of the maps. One bug however, is sometimes when the game is finished it won't continue into the part that adds up points and declares a winner. It just sits in the game, as if it was someone's turn, but there is nothing to do. I tried exiting and coming back to it, because it usually saves the game for me, only to come back and find that it did not get saved. :( I will give 5 stars once this is fixed! Very fun otherwise.

Love this game have a number of the board game versions.  I would rank it higher except it doesn't link to your account for the computer version. I wish it recognised that I purchased all the maps on my pc version and allowed me to play them here when I log into my days off wonder account

I just bought India and I attempted to play 3 games, only successfully completing 1 of them because of technical issues. I was playing online and the server kicked me out in the middle of 2 of my games claiming that I was inactive, but clearly I was active. The message seemed delayed by like 2 turns...and there was no option to ignore it. Please fix asap!
Need more maps

11-20-15 update: Overall: Love the update, like all the new features & lay out and setting options, good job!   I do have a question though, is there anywhere where the different AI personalities are described, in terms of if one is easy, one is hard or if one has a particular tendency while another has other tendencies?   Also I noticed some bugs/problems: if you go into the tutorial & then exit (I'm guessing before you're done, cause that's what I did and that's when this happened) the app just crashes.  If you create an online game w/ a buddy, and send an invite, the buddy doesn't get an invite.  Lastly, when you create a local game, it's not possible to see it.  I was sitting 2 feet from my husband, both of us w/ our wifi on & working, & neither of us could see the game the other one had started locally.
replyContent:
Yes, each AI has a different style when playing. I'd say Marg Loughbot is easier to beat, while Vanderbot Jr. will be the most competitive opponent.

The tutorial crash is fix in the next update. The others will be tackled as soon as possible. Invitations end up in the Resume section; check there if the notification did not make it.

content: I really like the game, but the app kept crashing.

UPDATE: Thanks for the reply. I know you can leave the game during the asynchronous games. However I like to play the real time games (pink), and if I accidentally bump the side of my phone and turn the screen off, I'm temporarily booted from the game. not sure if this can be changed or not. I changed my rating back to 5 stars because it is no longer crashing on me.
replyContent:
You CAN leave the game temporarily. That's the major feature of the update!
But to do so, you must be in a mutli-session game (the ones with the BLUE CLOCK) as the single session games are indeed made to ensure that when you start a game you will end it before you leave.

And regarding the bugs, we are fixing them as quickly as possible. Thank you

content: This game has you go up against others.

content: I don't care for the new design. I just want to play the game with as few frills as possible. And every update forces me to download 200+ MB. Absolutely ridiculous. Why not have a base version with the option to download enhanced graphics? Also, it crashes a lot more now.

content: Updated to version 2.0 and on my older tablet, and its slooooow.  I know my Nexus 7 is old, but version 1.x worked great.  So far, the computer only uses 1 strategy, collect 60+ cards before playing anything, then plays them in straight order.  Its like they drew the exact train cards needed for all of their routes, and no extra cards.  It feels like cheating to me.  In version 2.1, could they expand the settings menu so we could disable some of the animations so the game runs smoother?  Also, the new "DING" is louder and more obnoxious than the "Choo-Choo" in the old version.  The new graphics are top-notch, and the various new features are great.  The AI and the slow interface are enough to bring it down to a 2-star review.
replyContent: Bots have different personas. Try the other ones. And we will restore the Choo-choo. And give more options regarding the animations. Thanks for your feedback.

replyContent:
This is an installation issue. It can be fixed with this procedure :
1. Uninstall the app
2. Clear the data and cache from the Google Play Store
3. Clear the data and cache from the Download Manager
4. Restart the phone
5. Re-install the app

replyContent:
There are 3 reasons that may prevent from claiming a route :
- not engouh cards of the right color
- not enough trains pawns in hand (usually that happens at the end of the game)
- playing 2 or 3 players game and the other track of a double route has been claimed already

Otherwise, send a screenshot to : www.daysofwonder.com/en/contact/digital

content: I love everything about this game and bought the other maps too--but at this price could you please add the ability to save games in progress? Then I'll bump it up to 5 stars. It's great practice for when we play the table top version as a family ;)

content: The game, itself, is very well  designed. It is easy to understand and enjoyable to play and I was expecting to give it a 5* rating when I first played; however, there are functions which do not work- often I will find that I can't place routes for no apparent reason. After spending over ¬£5 on the app (the most expensive app I've ever bought), I am absolutely appalled that I can't now play it properly. Please fix this.
replyContent: There are 3 reasons that may prevent from claiming a route : 1) not engouh cards of the right color . 2) not enough trains pawns in hand (usually that happens at the end of the game) 3) playing 2 or 3 players game and the other track of a double route has been claimed already Otherwise, send a screenshot to : www.daysofwonder.com/en/contact/digital

content: Pricey for what you get, wish I could save games

content: I couldnt play with my friends from my android to their iphones
replyContent: Please update the app and it should work fine now.

However, the games themselves are super fun!  If this app was updated a bit, I would definitely give it five stars.

content: Online don't wirk

Feels like an afterthought of a port to android phones. Having to drag tiny cards around covers up critical graphics. The cross hairs should be offset a bit so you can see what you're doing. I can imagine it's better on a tablet. 2nd time I tried running it I only got a blank screen and had to reinstall. When I try playing multiplayer, it says to tap Go to continue, but the Go button is grey and won't respond.

If you want to play against very terrible AI bots or random strangers online it's great. If you have specific people that you want to play with it's cumbersome to get games started. Worse when somebody crashes the previously mentioned really really stupid bots step in and completely blow the game.   It seems like they would make a lot more money if you could pause games, and send people game invites they could receive outside of the game.

Ticket to ride is a fun game, but the Android experience is neutered in comparison to the cheaper iOS version. It's 4x the price and doesn't include local network play. Online play doesn't let you try and organize a game between anybody you actually know.   If you want to play with a friend, pass and play is seemingly your only option and that's just lame.
replyContent: Phillip, you can create a private game and your friend can join the game using a password. We know this is a bit painfull and we are preparing an update to improve this. And to add local network play, like the iOS version. Thank you for your feedback.

content: Are you kidding? I can't even save a game and come back to it later? For an app that costs this much I expect to be able to do something as simple as save a game in progress.
replyContent: Amanda, this is a feature that indeed a lot of people are asking for. We are preparing an update to add this, and many other improvements. Thanks for your feedback.

content: Great game that my wife and I play all the time, especially on flights and road trips when one of us doesn't drive. My biggest problem is it eats through my battery from a full charge in about 2 or 3 games. The scores don't save. The maps are also expensive, after already paying for the base game.

replyContent: Please update the app and it should work fine now.

content: Amazing as a board game, amazing as an Android game.

Would love to have a setting in the game that stops the phone from going to sleep when screen isn't touched. I know there is a setting for this in the options for my phone, but most of my other games don't allow the phone to go to sleep while in game. Still an awesome game tho!

The xbox version of this game is MUCH better.  The game itself is awesome.  Buy the board game.  This is about an hour board game to play.  On android, the game completely starts over if your screen goes dark because someone is thinking strategy too long on their turn. When you turn your screen back on, you are back at the title screen and you have lost all your game progress.  NOT cool. I had to set my power settings on my screen never to turn off.  You shouldn't have to adjust power settings to make a game work. My other major complaint is that the music is annoying. I usually just turn it off, but sometimes you want nice music with your board game.  Beyond that the interface is wonky.  It's hard to get the color you want when you play multiplayer.  Oh, one more thing, you can't play pass and play with bots.  It's either player vs. computer or player vs. player.  You can't mix up multiplayer and computer players.  Some people may not care, but when it's just my son and me we want to round out the table with 4 players anyway.
replyContent: Joseph, we take you point. We are working at improving the app, and your feedback is welcome. Thank you for your patience.

content: Bought this a few years ago when it was on a holiday sale in the Play store.  I have played mostly on my Asus Transformer TF700 tablet and really enjoyed it. I have also played on my HTC One M8 and while the interface is small, everything works just fine.  Highly recommended for a fun and engaging mobile game!

replyContent: There are issues when using a different keyboard than the default Google Keyboard. Please install the Google Keyboard, switch to it, launch the game, connect and then you can switch back to your original keyboard.

content: Great Fun, quick but thoughtful game, one of the good ones and worth 5 stars.

Really really disappointed that this $4.99 game doesn't support cross-platform play. The whole reason I paid for it was to play with my friends (who all have iOS devices). It's a good adaptation of the game, but I don't really enjoy playing with strangers, so I guess I'm out of luck until this gets fixed...?
replyContent: Ticket to Ride on Android can play with Ticket to Ride on both iPad, PC, Mac, Linux and of course Android. But it cannot play with iPhone's version Ticket to Ride Pocket (because that version uses Apple's Game Center which is not available on other platforms) If you want a refund, contact http://www.daysofwonder.com/en/contact/digital-t2r-android

content: If you've played the ios version, don't waste your time or money on this one. Costs over 3x more and has half the functionality. Buyer's remorse after 15 minutes.

All I'm saying is that this game could be way better. Lets get it fixed. Please.

Great implementation of a great game. However, some minor tech issues with hanging and crashing occasionally. Very happy when it works.
